hu.elte.eserial.annotation.inclusionrule

Class AbstractInclusionRule<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.elte.eserial.annotation.inclusionrule.AbstractInclusionRule<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - the type of annotation this rule applies to
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExcludeThisInclusionRule, IncludeElementsInclusionRule, IncludeMatchingInclusionRule

    public abstract class AbstractInclusionRule<A>
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class for evaluating EserialAnnotation EserialAnnotationType.Inclusion constraints.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected A annotation 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean evaluate(EserialElement element)
      An element of an object which will be evaluated.
      abstract boolean isInclusionRule()
      Describes whether this rule is an inclusion or an exclusion rule.

      For inclusion rules the processing should be stopped when the evaluate(hu.elte.eserial.recursion.model.EserialElement) returns true.
      For exclusion rules the processing should be stopped when the evaluate(hu.elte.eserial.recursion.model.EserialElement) returns false.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • annotation

        protected A annotation

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public abstract boolean evaluate(EserialElement element)
        An element of an object which will be evaluated.
        Parameters:
        element - an element containing the getter or setter to be checked and the value of the field
        Returns:
        true if the element should be included according to the EserialAnnotation

      • isInclusionRule

        public abstract boolean isInclusionRule()
        Describes whether this rule is an inclusion or an exclusion rule.

        For inclusion rules the processing should be stopped when the evaluate(hu.elte.eserial.recursion.model.EserialElement) returns true.
        For exclusion rules the processing should be stopped when the evaluate(hu.elte.eserial.recursion.model.EserialElement) returns false.
        Returns:
        true if this is an inclusion rule, false if it's an exclusion rule
